name: Rice and Zucchini
description: The recipe for rice with zucchini in the 60-Minute Gourmet column in The Living Section last Wednesday omitted a step. Here is a corrected version.
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, rice, zucchini, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Trim and wash the zucchini and cut them into 1/2-inch cubes, about 2 cups.

Melt the butter in a saucepan and add the onions and zucchini. Cook, stirring, until the onions are wilted. Add the turmeric, rice, water, bay leaf, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cover tightly and simmer for 17 minutes.
Remove from the heat, add the coriander and mix well with a fork.
